snippet: Chris Andersen is returning to the Heat at a bargain price, a move that lessens the luxury-tax burden the Heat will face this coming season.
abstract: Miami Heat sign forward Chris Andersen to a one-year, $1.7 million contract.
lead_paragraph: Chris Andersen is returning to the Heat at a bargain price, a move that lessens the luxury-tax burden the Heat will face this coming season.

headline.main: Andersen Signs Deal to Stay With Heat
